name: cssSweet
description: cssSweet is a suite of tools for processing CSS. It comes with several output modifiers to modify CSS values, and a plugin that concatenates and processes CSS from specified chunks to a minified CSS file. Version 2+ will also concatenate and minifie JS.
author: @sepiariver YJ Tso

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Valid, 6-character hex against which to evaluate light and dark hex values.

properties.name: custom_css_chunk
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse (S)CSS.

properties.name: custom_css_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled CSS.

properties.name: dev_css_chunk
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse (S)CSS in DEV mode.

properties.name: dev_css_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled CSS in DEV mode.

properties.name: custom_css_path
properties.description: Full path for directory to which to OUTPUT the final CSS file.

properties.name: minify_custom_css
properties.description: Minify CSS on output. MUST be enabled for SCSS processing.

properties.name: scss_import_paths
properties.description: Optionally set import paths to check for SCSS imports. All @import paths must be relative to these.

properties.name: strip_css_comment_blocks
properties.description: Strips CSS comment blocks on output. minify_custom_css must be enabled for this to have effect.

properties.name: css_output_format
properties.description: Choose either nested or standard CSS output format.
